scripts.dev:with-api-jest: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && docker exec -it api-jest npm run test
scripts.dev:with-web-jest: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && docker exec -it web-jest npm run test
scripts.dev:build:with-api-jest: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d && docker exec -it api-jest npm run test
scripts.dev:build:with-web-jest: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d && docker exec -it web-jest npm run test
